### M-BUS protocol

L-A H-B
RS-485 Baudrate:921600

```
轮子接受数据
[00:08:39.422]收←◆00 40 00 40 00 40 00 40 FF FF FF FF DF 7A 55 20 00 1A A0 01 02 00 65 22 A8 FF 60 01 FE FF 00 00 14 01 90 00 DD 77 A0 33 00 00 00 00 62 30

[00:11:48.298]收←◆55 0D 04 33 03 0C 01 00 40 0C B0 61 4C
```
